original_title: Frank Terpil: Confessions of a Dangerous Man
overview: Frank Terpil, in flight from a 53-year sentence for supplying arms to terrorists, is interviewed from his exile in Beirut. Profiting from terror without suffering qualms takes a certain mentality. Terpil details the operations of the merchants of terror.
title: Frank Terpil: Confessions of a Dangerous Man
